Sunday Sound is a Swedish pop / rock band from VÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¤xjÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶ which was formed in 2005. The debut album Drama Queen was released in 2007.



	
Members of the Sunday Sound is originally from Gothenburg, SÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶lvesborg, VÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¤rnamo and JÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶nkÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶ping.

Spring 2005 running on Daniel Persson Mattias StrÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶mberg, in the context of their joint music studies at VÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¤xjÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶ University. In short, they began to cooperate when it emerged that they had similar musical influences. Some material was written and recorded in Mattias hemmastudio. Marcus JÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶nsson invited to listen and liked what he heard. Soon, these three groups Feedback. Band name changed shortly to Longitude, when bassist Anders joins the group.

After a few gigs leave Anders band to be replaced by Ola Thuresson. New bassist meant new band name, and Sunday Sound are born in the autumn of 2005. The newest member switch adds a little rougher sound. In collaboration with producer Charlie Storm created debut album Drama Queen, which is released on its company Checoban Records.

Sunday Sound attracted attention when they allowed fans to edit the music video for first track More than Dead on the Drama Queen. This was the first documented time in the world where a music video edited on the internet, the Sunday sounds cases via video editing site Jaycut.
